reviews.review: Really worth game for a competitive shooter and will improve your hand eye coordination as well as point and click aim over time, since the game is free, you can get it and play casual or community servers but must pay 15$ to play competitive if you haven't bought the game back when it was payed for. This sucks but makes sense and I recommend trying this game out again if you haven't already as this old game has me hooked again.

- Wake up
- Copy someone else's review
- Shower
- CSGO
- Miss sniper shot
- Loose competitive game
- Look at skins
- Cry because can't afford skins
- Post copied review
- Go sleep
- Wake up with more likes than original review
- Repeat
very good very sexy very nice
Why do i keep playing this shit game
